de.upb.pcm.interpreter.metrics

Class ResourceStateListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.upb.pcm.interpreter.metrics.ResourceStateListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.uka.ipd.sdq.simucomframework.resources.IStateListener

    public class ResourceStateListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements de.uka.ipd.sdq.simucomframework.resources.IStateListener
    Utilization performance metric for resources, based on queue length at resources. Interval starts at first change of queue length. Interval limited to simple interval.
    Author:
    Joachim Meyer

        processingResourceType - the processing resource type (pcm) of the resource.

        modelHelper - the model helper.
        measurementSpecification - the measurement specification of the resource container of the resource.
        resourceContainerMeasurement - the resource container measurement of the prm.
        resourceContainer - the pcm resource container of the resource.
        processingResource - the pcm processing resource specification of the resource.
